title: Public Transport Website
description: This project is designed to learn the integration of databases with frontend and backend languages by building a website.

title: Digimon Run Run Game
description: Developed a coin-collecting game in Java with intuitive controls and scoring systems for an immersive player experience.

title: Footwear E-commerce App
description: Created an Android app for a footwear e-commerce platform. Used Kotlin for development and Firebase for data storage.

title: GeoQuiz App
description: This project aims to build an interactive Android app that tests geography knowledge.

title: Covid 19 Data Access
description: A project to understand the Scala language by analyzing COVID-19 datas.

title: Tic Tac Toe Game
description: This is a project made to learn the python languages by building a game.

title: Medical App Figma
description: Use Figma to design a prototype for a medical app and gain foundational knowledge in UI/UX.

title: ATM Machine Figma
description: Understand the entire software workflow through creating a prototype and drawing use case, class, sequence, and activity diagrams.
